components.activityColumnRef:
CASE
    WHEN <%= process_explorer_classification %> = 0 THEN
    "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_<%= language %>"
    WHEN  <%= process_explorer_classification %> = 1
    THEN
        CASE
            WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."KONNR")=1 
            THEN "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN"
            ELSE "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" || ' within Contract'
         END
    ELSE "_CEL_P2P_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN"
END

activityConfigurations.name: Create Purchase Order Item within Contract
Record Service Entry Sheet within Contract

components.title: #{ProcessExplorer}

axis0.name: #{AverageNumberOfContractReleaseOrderItems}
axis0.text:
CASE 
WHEN (ISNULL("EKPO"."KONNR")=0)
THEN
FLOOR((1.0*PU_COUNT("LFA1", "EKPO"."EBELP"))/(1.0*PU_COUNT_DISTINCT("LFA1", ROUND_<%=unit2%>("EKPO"."TS_AEDAT"))))
ELSE NULL
END
axis0.translatedName: Average Number of Contract Release Order Items

formula.text: KPI("Net Value Of Contract Release Order Items")

axis2.name: #{NetValueOfContractReleaseOrderItems}
axis2.text: KPI("Net Value Of Contract Release Order Items")
axis2.translatedName: Net Value of Contract Release Orders

variables.name: Order_Message_Activities
variables.value: 'Send Purchase Order', 'Send Purchase Order Update', 'Dun Order Confirmation', 'Send Overdue Notice'

variables.name: filter8_text
variables.value: ABC filter for Vendor on Net Order Value

variables.name: ButtonDrilldown4
variables.value: CASE WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") >= 0 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 100 THEN 'a) 0 - 100€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 100 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 500 THEN 'b) 100 - 500€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 500 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 1000 THEN 'c) 500 - 1.000€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 1000 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 10000 THEN 'd) 1.000 - 10.000€' ELSE 'e) > 10.000€' END

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END
